name: Bunky Mercado
text: EXCELLENT food and service at a GREAT price!

name: Joseph Herr
text: This place is CLOSED permanently I think

name: Amanda Per
text: I would give this place 0 stars if I could! Took them exactly 24 minutes to even get my food on the grill and there was only 2 other people that had ordered before me. Got my plate 32 minutes after I ordered. Food might be hot but other than that it takes FOREVER to get your food even if you're the only person in here. Dont plan on coming here if you're in a rush.

name: Felix Diaz
text:
GREAT TIMES DESERVE GREAT FOOD AMERICAN DELI❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Made to Order and fresh is our signature
Come over guys try us we are going to come back you again because every guest is very special to us 🙏🏼

People there are nice! Food is prepared fresh and you can see it being prepared. The shrimp fried rice and burgers with wings are so good 😋

name: David Schoonover
text: Restaurant smelled unpleasant despite appearing to be fairly new.  Took two bites of fried rice and threw away. Never again.

name: Caitlyn Stephenson
text: Like most places in or around Montgomery the service is terrible. The Cashier is so rude its almost comical, but yet they have a tip jar on the counter. The drink and dining area are dirty  and the food is mediocre at best.

name: Robert Nicholson (Rob)
text: Had Philly and wings. Both were really good. Even the people waiting on s was great!! Defiantly going back..

name: Miranda milner
text: I’ve been to this location three times in the last week or so. Each time, the staff has been incredibly rude. I phoned in an order on the second visit and the girl on the phone argued with me about my order.. she then handed the phone off to someone else saying “somebody else deal with this”.. I’m not sure where the management is (if there even is any) but, they will not last if they continue to have such poor customer service. The food is hit or miss at the Wetumpka location. I never, ever, have this problem with the Burbank location in Montgomery. There’s no need to be as rude and disrespectful as this staff is.

name: Valerie Johnson
text: I ordered the philly and wing combo and got home and realized they did not put the wings in my box after I waited 40 minutes for my food. The service was horrible and the cashier was very rude. Will not be going back.

name: Richard Edwards
text: Since they're under new management, the food and service is a lot better

name: william jeon
text: The food tastes really good here.

name: Melanie Good
text: Wouldn't know. Everytime we try to come here in the evening, they're closed, even though they are supposedly open till 9.

name: Phillip Puckett
text: Great food and fast service get your money worth

name: Michael King
text: The fact that they call this place a deli is criminal misrepresentation. The only deli-like item on the menu is the "Ruben" sandwich, and they can't seem to understand the concept, much less the execution. They dry grilled the meat and then had to go out and buy the saurkraut. If I wasn't really hungry, and hadn't already paid, I would have cancelled my order and walked.

name: C Ray Marilu S Beasley
text: Good deli food. Philly steak was excellent.

name: Jennifer Easterwood
text: Philly steak sandwich is awesome,small menu

name: Brigette Boykin
text: Got here 5 minutes ago which is 4:55pm on a Sunday and was told by employees that they were closed, yet there werer people sitting in the restaurant eating...I'm confused

name: Charlie Luckie
text: Let me start with, IM ADDICTED TO AMERICAN DELI! But I have recently moved from Montgomery to Wetumpka. Within the last week I have ordered from the Wetumpka location three times and all three times were HORRIBLE. Staff is NOT friendly. NONE OF THEM. They laugh at you when you have a complaint or need. I call on advance so there is no wait. But yet I still end up waiting 30 mins for my food . Doesn't matter what time of day it is. There never seems to be a leader of any sort on duty. They argued with me about my order on the 2nd time. I order the same thing EVERY SINGLE DAY. I just wish they would fix the staff or training process to make things more enjoyable.  Sincerely, American Deli addict

name: Samantha Harris
text: I waited 30 minutes for food then manager came out and said couldnt give my money back and another manager came out a d agreed with me about waiting to long for our food. I wouldnt ever go back there. They afe very slow and rude. One girl thought it was funny when i waited so long for my food. Vwrh bad service

name: Ariel Jones
text: The staff is very friendly, and the food is always prepared freshly!

name: Tommy Hatcher
text: 4th day in a row I’ve tried calling and no one answers. I Walked in Walmart and watched them ignore the phone.

name: stacy Guary
text: Food is good workers are too slow

name: Kelly Ann
text: I ordered a Philly combo, just one, for me and my boyfriend to split. We waited over 30 minutes for this one meal, while other people who got there after us were receiving their meals, and a couple even had the same thing. Awful service. Will not be going back.

name: Paris Davis-Lawson
text: Very fast service and the workers are nice

name: Tammy “POSSUM” Bullock
text: I love the chicken wings

name: Antonio Shelton
text: Love the wings

name: Louise Moore
text: I like the food and the service

name: Torshia Vaughn
text: Good food

name: Brandian Gamble

resp.text: Thanks for the love, Brandian! We hope you will visit again soon!

name: Robert Lech
text: Buffalo chicken cheese sandwich with double meat is Spot On

resp.text: Now that's a great sounding lunch - I know what I'm having now :)  Thanks for the great review, Robert!

name: Sammy Seldat
text: sent me to top of mountains

name: Joe
text: One of the best philly cheese steak sandwiches I've had. Highly reccomend.

name: Dagrim
text: Absolutely love these Philly Steak Sandwiches!  They are so tasty, i am looking forward to Returning to Alabama just so i can go back and eat again :)  Only thing that is annoying is i have to go into that huge mall to get me some Philly Steak.  Wish i could sacrifice a meal so i could try something different, I am sure it would be just as good but i can't not have my usual.

name: David Gardner
text: Good cheese steak at reasonable price, for a mall food court.  A couple of caveats:  Unless you tell them NOT to, they will put mayonnaise, lettuce, and tomato on it.  (Mayo on a cheese steak...Have mercy!)  And they'll also put that damn seasoning salt on your fries unless you tell them not to.

resp.text: Thanks so much, David, for the great 5-star review! We really appreciate it and hope to have you back soon!

name: Sweet'N Divine
text: One of my favs

name: Summer Lusk
text: Best Philly cheesesteaks and fries in the area. Fast service and fresh food. Affordable prices with a variety of of options.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Summer, and we look forward to having you back in here with us again soon!

name: Richard Nunn
text: Philly cheese steak at the Galleria done right. It didn't have the sauce from what I could tell, but man it was banging.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: chico chang
text: Good

name: Heather Beaudet
text: This place is amazing! Wonderful food and great customer services! This was my first time here and I loved it! I will definitely be coming back!

resp.text: Hey, we appreciate the review!

name: John Doe
text:
This place is hit or miss.  I love eating at Charley's but not so much here at FT Rucker.  I've been here for 6 months now.  The first few weeks, I came here to eat several times but each time it just kept getting worse.  Now, it's almost the last place I'll go and eat at.
There were times when I walk up to order, only one ordering, and it's like I'm not there.  They keep talking to each other, though they saw me walk up.  It's like they have to finish up on talking about their lives or other people and then they can help you.  it's my lunch break...I don't have time for you guys to finish.  I need my food so I can go back to work.
Also, when they cut up my steak, then cut up someone else's raw chicken, then go back to fixing up my steak...I'm pretty sure that's a health violation and dangerous.  They preach that you never cross contaminate but these folks do.  I just pray that the spatula they are using is super hot and kills the salmonella.
Also, if I get the special fries that come with ranch on it...I don't need 80% ranch, and 10% fries.  I like ranch on my fries but not drowning in ranch so much it comes out of the to go carrier box.  Then I have to toss them in the garbage.
The folks here need real management or a better supervisor.  Cause at the moment, I know myself and others where I work, will not go back.  Places like this need to get away with hooking friends and family up.  That's all I see on Ft Rucker and probably why most things go down hill. I know they might be your cousin or brother but if they can't do the job...fire them.

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you had an unpleasant experience at one of our locations, John. Feel free to email shareyourstuff@charleys.com if you would like to provide more information on how we could have improved your experience.

name: Brandon Lewis
text: The last 2 times I have been here they have no trays for you to eat off of. I have had to go get a dirty tray off of a trash can. I think its about time some of these garbage employees lose their cushy little job on fort rucker. Pretty sad that they just blow you off when you tell them they have no trays

resp.text: We are disappointed to hear that you had an unpleasant experience at one of our locations, Brandon. Feel free to email shareyourstuff@charleys.com if you would like to provide more information on how we could have improved your experience.

name: Micala Mayle
text: Every time this charleys is a disappointment and a waste of money.

resp.text: Oh no! That's not something we want to hear, we are sorry we have not met your expectations. Will you please email us at feedback@charleys.com with some details about your experiences. We want to make things right! Thanks, Micala.

name: Christina Anderson
text: Excellent service. Food is good.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words and 5-star review, Christina!

name: Kenneth S
text: Amazing food, always hits the spot, great customer service as well

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review, Kenneth, and come back anytime to see us!

name: midecarft best
text: Closest thing I can get to a real philly. However, wish they put more meat on the sandwiches

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Elizabeth Bentley
text: Don't go here! They will charge you for things and not give them to you. Even after you show them your receipt to prove you paid for your items. Worst customer service. I've never had to argue with someone at a restaurant before and I can't believe they would even argue with a customer. DON'T GO!

name: Laird Culver
text: Try the chicken cordon bleu with banana peppers. Service is fast and friendly.

name: Courtney Westrick
text: Great cheesesteaks

resp.text: Courtney, thanks so much for the review and we hope you come back in again soon!

name: Joseph kyle Davis
text: Good food

resp.text: Hey, Joseph, we appreciate the comments and the 5-star review!

name: GM Cris
text: Great sandwiches.

name: Daisy Davis
text: The shrimps are tiny compared to what I'm accustomed to.  I understand that it may have something to do with them being hard to get now due to the pandemic... however; the portion is still pretty good..

resp.text: Thank you for that constructive review! We have new "special" menu items available. Please come by and try them out!

name: Sam Johnson
text: They were my fav when traveling through Prattville it was a must but yesterday was disappointing, they have changed their wings that are now smaller than wingettes; which is fine but don’t go up on your prices in the process and some of the wings were not clean as pictured below which is yucky! The server was very nice. They take call ins but don’t prepare them until you arrive at the store unless you prepay over the phone which they don’t ask if you’d like to do to avoid waiting around; so I don’t understand the purpose of call in.

resp.text: Due to many experiences of food not being picked-up from call in orders we have set a new policy on call in orders. You may refer to the info update section for the new policy. We also apologize for the unpleasurable experience on the food. We will review this and improve on this matter. Thank you.

name: Dymon Dior
text: The only reason why I’m giving it 4 stars is because of the customer service could be better with one of the employees  . But The owner is very nice and the food is always great.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review. We will do our best in improving on that issue

name: Eveie Edgar
text: First time visiting as I was passing through town and not only were they really kind, but they were insanely cheap and absolutely delicious! For four adults the total was $31!! I got a Philly Cheesesteak

resp.text: Thank you for that feedback! Please come back soon!

name: Rex Allen (Allenrex)
text: Great food great service. The Reuben is one of the best in town. The wings are also some of the best in town.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Mark D
text: Great Food but customer service poor

resp.text: Thank you for the constructive review. We will do our best to work on that issue and wish to see you back!

name: Delores Coe
text: Went in at 840 and could not get fried rice because they "already cleaned the grill". Looked at grill and it was definitely not cleaned.

resp.text: I sincerely apologize for your unsatisfying experience.. We take cleanliness and preparation very seriously here and have improved drastically since then. Please stop by once again!

name: Captain Steve Harriott ll
text: Best philly cheesesteak in town. service impeccable friendly capt approved recommended two to three times a week

resp.text: Thank you for that!

name: Amanda “PANDA” Toolooze
text: The best cheese steak I ever had.

resp.text: Thank you! Hopefully we will see you again!

name: Kimberly Holley
text:
I see why Montgomery/Prattville Covid numbers are high!  Customers do not have mask, employees either don't have on a mask or are wearing it under their necks - even while prepping or preparing the food.  Expect long wait times with a side of covid!

Update:
Thank you for your response.  Unfortunately I will not be returning to this location; but, again I thank you for taking time to respond 8 months later.

resp.text: I apologize for that.. We take protocol and safety extremely seriously especially when it comes to health and the current pandemic. Please refer to the new Covid policy updates on our site. Hope to see you again soon

name: Earth Angel
text: I've visited this location a couple of times, each visit was pleasant. The wait time after placing your order is reasonable. For the price I wish that the seafood was fresh and not frozen.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: SRT 392
text: Food is always hot and fresh, excellent customer service here

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Tiffany W
text: So good! I usually get the Philly combo with wings and fries. It's good for 2 meals or at least 1 meal and a snack later. And it's so delicious!

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Teresa Driver
text: Wings where old.

resp.text: I apologize for your unfortunate experience here at American Deli. We will do our best to always keep up the best of quality in our food and service. Thank you and please come back soon

name: Wesley Perkins
text: Great cashiers. Wings normally are great.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Emery Graham
text: Called in a order to be ready in 15 i get there food hasn’t even began to be made.

resp.text: I apologize for the unsatisfying experience. We have set a new policy on "call-in" orders. Please refer to the info updates on the policy. Thank you

name: Katrina Kynard
text: OMG the service and the food I couldn't have picked a better place to eat in Montgomery..will definitely visit again.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Roy Franks
text: American Deli Inc Is a franchise owned by individuals, so this rating is for the specific  franchisee at the Prattville location. For starters the building is new, so that’s always a plus, unfortunately they cheaped out on the chairs and the backs of them are installed incorrectly. The establishment is nice , and the cashier was friendly. Their CC processor froze while I paid so I had to wait about 10 minutes to pay. The food took about 25 minutes , compared to other locations taking 6-9 minutes. Food wise it’s the same as any other location so the consistency is there. I’m rating 4 stars because it’s a new establishment, I think with proper training this establishment could run as good as the rest of the franchise locations.

resp.text: Thank you for this constructive review! We have improved ten folds since than and also added new delicious items to our menu. Please come by soon and try the new and improved American Deli!

name: TINA KEKELIK
text: Super fresh and hot food and the place was very clean and had great service.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Kim Posey
text: Today I got a preview of what is being offered. Absolutely the best Philly Cheese steak I have had in a long time. The wings and Gyro were delicious as well! If you are in Prattville, AL this is a must stop location.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

name: Tanya Brumett
text: They have the best wings. I really enjoy the garlic parmesan flavor. Cooked to order, so be prepared to wait.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

text: Lemon pepper wings was more of a powder that lemon and pepper. The hot wings did not have a lot of sauce on it they were dry

resp.text: I apologize for your unsatisfying experience here. We take food quality seriously and will improve from this. Please come by again soon!

name: Carrie Lynne Cook
text: We walked in, looked around, and walked back out. One table was eating Chinese stir fry. One table was eating fried catfish. Another person had a sandwich. There was a strange, unpleasant smell in the place, with too many food genres going on. We went in based on the name Deli in the name, but it did not seem like a deli based on what everyone in there was chowing on.

resp.text: I apologize for your unpleasurable experience here. We are more than just a deli and have been adding new menu items since then. Hopefully we can have you back soon to try out the new and improved American Deli!

name: Desta Taylor
text: The philly steak sandwich was huge and so good. You definitely get a lot of food for your money.

resp.text: Thank you! Please come again!

text: Dude! Service was excellent. And the portions are generous. I had the Chinese rice w a tilapia filet. And lemme tell you, the rice is better here than any Chinese food place around. Good variety of food and very clean!

name: No Way
text:
(Translated by Google) Naa

(Original)

name: Katie Provost
text: Good, but.... what do they have against veggies?  I was so disappointed after my food was delivered last night that I almost left a horrible review. It was just about the most pitiful cheesesteak sandwich I've ever seen. After digging through the cheesesteak, I finally spotted one speck of bell pepper and a couple of tiny onion pieces. Normally I order my phillies with extra, but  there was no option for special requests.  Also, it was not disclosed that the salads came with pickles (chopped into tiny pieces?!?). Not necessarily gross, but what an unpleasant surprise! But I was famished and ate it anyway. Oh, and the rattle in my cup of diet Coke with no ice (which actually was an option) .....

name: Collin. Claira 4
text: There hot wings are great

name: Sparla Petty
text: My family and I went to eat lunch at American Deli, the new people got it going on! The tall man with the glasses took our order and was 100% professional, wonderful costumer service! Great wings, sandwiches, hot fries!

name: Kevin Mackey
text: Listen folks, I have tried the sandwiches here and they are great. To say the wings here are amazing is an understatement. The wings are SO GOOD!! Best wings I have ever eaten, hands down.
